title: "Model"
format: html
---

Our Bayesian regression model is using the following mathematical formula:

```{=tex}
\begin{align*}
\text{Income}_i &= \beta_0 + \beta_1 \times \text{Wordsum}_i + \beta_2 \times \text{Race}_i + \beta_3 \times \text{Education}_i \\
&\quad + \beta_4 \times \text{PoliticalViews}_i + \beta_5 \times \text{Age}_i + \beta_6 \times \text{Gender}_i + \epsilon_i
\end{align*}
```
